name: Friday Night Funkin vs. Kapi
description:
The source code is part of phykro: https://phykro.itch.io/fonedin and go credit the original mod: https://gamebanana.com/mods/44683.

The songs in order are: 

Bopeebo: wocky

Fresh: beathoven

Dadbattle: hairball

Monster: nyaw

???: fuzzy distortion (it is not added yet)

v0.0.1: the kapi mod is released! errors: the camera looks zoomed in in nyaw (maybe for more suspention lol, there is no audience at all, it might sometimes crash (not most of the time but the 2% of the time yes) enjoy this mod! (Lol i ended this with a bad ending) i almost forgot! go check out the .html version down there in the sticky post!
